name: On the Way to Meet Mom
author: Gomyang
content: Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a &quotmom&quot when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: &quotCould this person... be my mom?&quotThis is the story of Mori&#039s long and challenging journey to find his mom.
